name: Hogwarts Stories
description:
Hogwarts Stories is a fan free game, currently in development, based on the world of Harry Potter films (However as stated this is a fan project and not endorsed by or affiliated with Warner Bros or JK Rowling at all.)

Created By:

- Maridany

- MineOriginal

After you downloaded the game, you need to unzip the file using the 7-zip.
